snippet.title: The Low Road Gameplay
snippet.description:
Gameplay from Chapter 1 of XGen Studios' The Low Road. 

Set in the 1970s automobile world, "The Low Road" is a point-and-click graphic adventure which follows a team of corporate spies dedicated to the protection (and appropriation) of game-changing industry secrets.  Sporting a unique visual style inspired by gouache paintings and a pulsating rock and roll score, "The Low Road" will captivate players though intricate puzzles, branching moral dilemmas, and a quirky cast of memorable characters.

The Low Road on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/603700/The_Low_Road/
http://www.thelowroad.com
